summary: An ordinance relating to the Eminent Domain proceedings for condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of 26th Avenue North, from East Thomas Street to East Madison Street, and for the establishing of the grades of said avenue, pursuant to Ordinance No. 53597; providing for the rejection of the awards had therein for the discontinuance of such proceedings and for repealing Ordinance No. 53597.
